object.name: setGameScore
object.description: Use this method to set the score of the specified user in a game message. On success, if the message is not an inline message, the Message is returned, otherwise True is returned. Returns an error, if the new score is not greater than the user's current score in the chat and force is False.
object.html_description: Use this method to set the score of the specified user in a game message. On success, if the message is not an inline message, the Message is returned, otherwise True is returned. Returns an error, if the new score is not greater than the user's current score in the chat and force is False.
object.rst_description: Use this method to set the score of the specified user in a game message. On success, if the message is not an inline message, the :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` is returned, otherwise :code:`True` is returned. Returns an error, if the new score is not greater than the user's current score in the chat and *force* is :code:`False`.

annotations.description: Pass True if the high score is allowed to decrease. This can be useful when fixing mistakes or banning cheaters
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the high score is allowed to decrease. This can be useful when fixing mistakes or banning cheaters
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the high score is allowed to decrease. This can be useful when fixing mistakes or banning cheaters
annotations.name: force

annotations.description: Pass True if the game message should not be automatically edited to include the current scoreboard
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the game message should not be automatically edited to include the current scoreboard
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the game message should not be automatically edited to include the current scoreboard
annotations.name: disable_edit_message

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the sent message
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the sent message
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Identifier of the sent message
annotations.name: message_id

annotations.description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.html_description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.rst_description: Required if *chat_id* and *message_id* are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.name: inline_message_id
